SEARCH
Module flag4j
Package org.flag4j.linalg.operations.dense.semiring_ops

Class DenseSemiRingTensorDot

java.lang.Object
org.flag4j.linalg.operations.dense.semiring_ops.DenseSemiRingTensorDot
public final class DenseSemiRingTensorDot extends Object
This class contains methods for computing a tensor dot product, i.e. tensor contraction, between two dense tensors whose elements are members of a Semiring.

    Computes the tensor dot product along the first tensors last axis and the second tensors second-to-last axis.

  • Method Details

    • tensorDot

      public static <V extends Semiring<V>> Shape tensorDot(Shape shape1, Semiring<V>[] src1, Shape shape2, Semiring<V>[] src2, Semiring<V>[] dest)
      Computes the tensor dot product along the first tensors last axis and the second tensors second-to-last axis. Or, if the second tensor has rank 1, the last axis of the second tensor.
      Parameters:
      shape1 - Shape of the first tensor in the tensor product.
      src1 - Entries of the first tensor in the tensor product.
      src2 - Entries of the tensor in the tensor product.
      dest - Array to store the tensor dot product in.
      shape1 - Shape of the second tensor in the tensor product.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If shape1 along the last axis does not match shape2 shape along the second-to-last axis.

    • tensorDot

      public static <V extends Semiring<V>> Shape tensorDot(Shape shape1, Semiring<V>[] src1, Shape shape2, Semiring<V>[] src2, int[] src1Axes, int[] src2Axes, Semiring<V>[] dest)
      Computes the tensor contraction of this tensor with a specified tensor over the specified set of axes. That is, computes the sum of products between the two tensors along the specified set of axes.
      Parameters:
      shape1 - Shape of the first tensor in the contraction.
      src1 - Entries of the first tensor in the contraction.
      shape2 - Shape of the second tensor in the contraction.
      src2 - Entries of the second tensor in the contraction.
      src1Axes - Axes along which to compute products for src1 tensor.
      src2Axes - Axes along which to compute products for src2 tensor.
      dest - Array to store the result of the tensor contraction in.
      Returns:
      The shape of the tensor resulting from the contraction.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the two tensors shapes do not match along the specified axes pairwise in aAxes and bAxes.
      IllegalArgumentException - If aAxes and bAxes do not match in length, or if any of the axes are out of bounds for the corresponding tensor.
